verbose_text: TOR promotes growth through either phosphorylation of ribosomal protein kinase p-70-S6 (S6K) to increase protein synthesis, or inhibition of 4EBP to enhance translation.
evidence: TOR promotes growth through either phosphorylation of ribosomal protein kinase p-70-S6 (S6K) to increase protein synthesis, or inhibition of 4EBP
